MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 area of Crewe, affecting properties in Cherry Tree Road, Ash Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.40AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a complex underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8AM on 22nd February 2021
